Comments_List: Skills with ordinary & partial differential equations; modeling systems.

Solve ode and pde in several methods
Look up the table of Laplace Transform
Use ode to solve pde.
I gained a strong understanding of differential equations and engineering problems associated with the different principles of diff eq.
Class moved very fast ; Professor Smooke is awesome.

strengthvery concisefair of grading
weaknesscover less material than academic year

I really appreciated that we burned through the course material quickly, and I think the resources available were great. I think I would have desired more explanation of what the tests would look like, but after the first test I had a good understanding of what to expect from the course and how to learn and gain the most out of the program.
Yes, ENAS 194 provides a good skillset for any engineering major ; take with Smooke if possible.
Great class to take in the summer. Get it over with.
Highly recommend to take in the summer. Very manageable
YesProfessor and TA are nice and patient
Yes. It is useful for anyone who needs it as a requirement, and I think the summer-structure is very useful for the engineering class.
